[@thirdweb-dev/sdk](./sdk.md) &gt; [Erc721SignatureMinting](./sdk.erc721signatureminting.md)

## Erc721SignatureMinting class

Enables generating dynamic ERC721 NFTs with rules and an associated signature, which can then be minted by anyone securely

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Erc721SignatureMinting 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(contractWrapper, roles, storage)](./sdk.erc721signatureminting._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Erc721SignatureMinting</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [generate(mintRequest)](./sdk.erc721signatureminting.generate.md) |  | Generate a signature that can be used to mint a dynamic NFT |
|  [generateBatch(payloadsToSign)](./sdk.erc721signatureminting.generatebatch.md) |  | Genrate a batch of signatures that can be used to mint many dynamic NFTs. |
|  [mint(signedPayload)](./sdk.erc721signatureminting.mint.md) |  | Mint a dynamically generated NFT |
|  [verify(signedPayload)](./sdk.erc721signatureminting.verify.md) |  | Verify that a payload is correctly signed |
